// Pseudo-code example:

// INPUT STATES


// Focus state
input.form-control:focus {
    box-shadow: bluish etc...
}


// Disabled state
input.form-control[type="text"][disabled]


// Disabled fieldsets
fieldset[disabled]...

// like this:
form
    fieldset[disabled]
        .form-group
            label
        ...
    /fieldset
/form


// Readonly state
input.form-control[type="text"][readonly]

Focus state

Focus state in Bootstrap is achieved by removing the default outline styles from some form controls. Instead, box-shadow CSS property is used.

Disabled state

Disabled fieldsets

Readonly state
